snippet: The operator of a business where people can store bottles of wine has been charged with stealing nearly $3 million in vintage wines from clients’ lockers.
abstract: George Osumi, operator of California business where people can store bottles of wine, is charged with stealing nearly $3 million in vintage wines from clients' lockers.
lead_paragraph: The operator of a business where people can store bottles of wine has been charged with stealing nearly $3 million in vintage wines from clients’ lockers.

headline.main: California: Owner Charged With Looting Wine Bank
headline.print_headline: California: Owner Charged With Looting Wine Bank
